subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|i}}: An ox ({{zh-l|*牛}}) with a symbol (now {{zh-l|*厶}}) to represent its [[low#Verb_3|low]]ing.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “moo”
: {{onomatopoeic|zh}}.
; “to seek; to obtain”
: By extension of {{och-l|蛑|a type of [[pest]] that eats sprouts and roots}}.
; “to love”
: Cognate with {{och-l|慕|to admire}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
; “look; appearance”
: Variant of {{ltc-l|模}}.
; “spear”
: Variant of {{ltc-l|矛}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|岑牟|來牟|侵牟|牟利|牟取|牟尼|頓牟|釋迦牟尼}}
